name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to become invisible.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering fabric that seems to change color depending on the lighting. It has a hood that can be pulled up to completely conceal the wearer's face.

special_effects.invisibility: Allows the wearer to become invisible for a limited time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A powerful staff infused with arcane energy.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft adorned with intricate runes. At the top of the staff, there is a glowing crystal that pulsates with magical energy.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the damage of spells by 20%

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Demon Dagger
description: A wicked dagger infused with dark magic
looks: The dagger has a black blade with glowing red runes etched into its surface. The handle is made of bone and adorned with demonic symbols.

special_weapon_skills.Dagger Mastery: Increases damage and critical hit chance with daggers.

special_effects.life_drain: Absorbs the life essence of enemies upon hit, restoring a portion of the user's health.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff with powerful restorative magic.
looks: The staff has a long wooden handle with intricate carvings, and the top is adorned with a glowing crystal.

special_weapon_skills.Healing Mastery: Increases effectiveness of healing spells by 20%.

special_effects.Healing Aura: Emits an aura of healing energy, restoring a small amount of HP to nearby allies.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings of the different elements. Each element is represented by a different colored gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_prowess: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 30%.
